title: Just thinking on the spot

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Make up something on the spot at the beginning of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you take longer than 20 seconds, your ability fails
-You may think of anything, including your attack value, your defense value, the voting time, if killing abilities fail, and just generally anything else that would have an effect on the game
-You may affect more than one person as long as you thought of it in 20 seconds or less
-You may not allowed to mass kill. You can choose if your attack rampages, but you cannot outright kill everyone
